Description: Fragment of papyrus: Demotic contract recto and verso.
Curator's comments: Kaplony-Heckel’s number 59; Kaplony-Heckel, U., Das Getreide-Darlehn P. Haun. Inv. Demot. 2, in K. Ryholt (ed.), Acts of the seventh international conference of Demotic studies. Copenhagen, 2002, 247. According to Kaplony-Heckel, it belongs with P. BM EA 71504 (her catalogue no. 060) and P. Heid Inv Dem 709. Part of a marriage contract with list of woman's property.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380946) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380946)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, insect attack Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
